Detailed Description

Maintains the basic information of a state.

Definition at line 1306 of file rkhitl.h.

Field Documentation

char* RKHBASE_T::name

State ID. This number isn't internally used by RKH framework. State name. String terminated in '\0' that represents the name of state. It's generally used for debugging.

Definition at line 1337 of file rkhitl.h.

HUInt RKHBASE_T::type

Contains the type of a particular state and can have the following values:

  • RKH_COMPOSITE: composite state.
  • RKH_BASIC: basic state.
  • RKH_JUNCTION: junction pseudostate.
  • RKH_CONDITIONAL: conditional pseudostate.
  • RKH_SHISTORY: shadow history pseudostate.
  • RKH_DHISTORY: deep history pseudostate.

Definition at line 1320 of file rkhitl.h.
